titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Our Polish story [videorecording-DVD] : family, faith and fortitudes : Detroit's Polish heritage.

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Our Polish story [videorecording-DVD] : family, faith and fortitudes : Detroit's Polish heritage.

physdesc.physfacet: sd., b&w and col. 1 booklet (36 p. : ill. ; 18 cm.)

odd.head: Formatted Contents Note
odd.p: Full length documentary (ca. 60 min.) -- Additional scenes (ca. 5 min.) -- Churches/choirs (ca. 3 min.) -- Flavors of Poland event (ca. 13 min.) -- Dance groups (ca. 5 min.) -- In production photo album (ca. 16 min.) -- Personal insights (ca. 23 min.)

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: "An inspirational look into the world of our Polish community"--Case.

odd.head: General Note
odd.p: Special features include additional scenes, churches/choirs, Flavors of Poland event, dance groups, in production photo album, and personal insights.
